PropertyList.name: auto
PropertyList.description:
The aircraft will conform to the Location tab selections. Use Runway, Runway on final approach, or Parking, in Location tab below.
Additional parameters required Use Runway, Runway on final approach, or Parking Or supply --lon=degrees Starting longitude (west = -) --lat=degrees Starting latitude (south = -) --altitude=value Starting altitude (in feet unless --units-meters specified) --heading=degrees Specify heading (yaw) angle (Psi) --vc=knots Specify initial airspeed
